item.description:
I'm going to be out of the country on April 25, so I'm moving this meet up to May 2.

Also, Joe's has re-opened just down the street from where it was. Papa Razzi is nice, but the food is a little more expensive and doesn't have as nice a dining area for meetings.
item.how_to_find_us: If you can't find the meeting, you can call my cell: (312) 497-9903.

group.name: The Boston Area Libertarian Meetup Group
